price: Faleni namazin, jepeni zekatin dhe përkuluni në ruku bashkë me ata që përkulen (në namaz).
arabic: وَأَقِيمُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتُواْ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَٱرۡكَعُواْ مَعَ ٱلرَّٰكِعِينَ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: wa-aqīmū al-ṣalata waātū al-zakata wa-ir'kaʿū maʿa al-rākiʿīna
